answers.answer: Do you have high blood pressure? Could be a sign of preeclampsia.
I had this with my 1st. I also had high blood pressure. This is called preeclampsia. I had to be induced. I have heard of girls that do leak small amounts of protein and are fine.
Do you have HELP syndrome too? You're early term at 37 weeks so no matter what,  baby should be just fine. I had pre e with my 1st and we were OK. Good luck! Try not to worry!

Being worried is the last thing you should be, since stress is one of the causes of preeclampsia. But you should absolutely be careful and know the signs to look out for. By this time you should be having weekly Dr appointments, so your Dr should be able to keep an eye on things. Get to l & d if your hands and face get swollen, and if your heart starts doing weird stuff. Or if you're concerned about something, call the nurses hotline.
Thanks guys. My doctor said everything is ok including my blood pressure but my doctor now have to put me on twice a week appointment to monitor by blood pressure

question: Am currently 37+2 days. Has anybody experience this? Your opinion please
title: HELP, protein in urine. do I have to be worried?
